attributes.review: So basically, the trump 2020 app almost made me kill myself. Letâ€™s start from the beginning. Hi, my name is Obunga (weird name, I know right? Itâ€™s actually Indian) and I am 37 years old. Roughly about two years ago, I was a heavy trump supporter. I loved him to the point I would die for him, therefore I tried to several times. Iâ€™ve tried to stick a fork in my toaster multiple times, when that didnâ€™t work I threw my toaster into my bathtub full of water and jumped in after it. Nothing would work, so when I went to actually meet Donald trump in order to tell him what I would do for him, and when he didnâ€™t even come out of the White House, I started crying. The securities out front had to escort me to the local police station, but as I am a white man, I did not get arrested, just a warning. I cried myself to sleep that night on the plane back to my home state, hugging my giant Donald Trump body pillow. The pillow took up the 2 seats next to me, which I was grateful for. The rona is very serious and I donâ€™t want it. That was when it clicked in my head. â€œI should jump out of this plane!â€ was what I had come up with in the span of 3 seconds. It was decided. I would jump out of the plane, because of my love for Donald Trump. I donâ€™t what it is. The way his wrinkles smoothly wrap around his face. His pouty lips, so chapped but kissable. When he said â€˜make America great againâ€™ in 2015? Never forgot it, in fact itâ€™s my motto. It was never great to begin with though, it became the sexiest country alive after that big fat orange man took charge. Heâ€™s 70 years old, which is a shame. What was I saying? Oh yeah, bungee jumping off a plane without the bungee. There I was, standing in front of the emergency door. Naturally, everyone was screaming in panic while I took off my clothes and enjoyed the breeze. I threw open the door and everything immediately got sucked out and crushed under the pressure of the atmosphere. Except for me. I was still alive. But I didnâ€™t want to be. Maybe I am still in love with Donald Trump. I wish to meet him one day, but I have epilepsy and Iâ€™m afraid his neon orange skin with blind me, and cause me to have a seizure. I canâ€™t help it, heâ€™s so sexy. I shed thousands of tears writing this, and I hope you will too. Thank you for reading my story.
